mse[source]

mse(y_pred, y, weights=None)

Mean Squared Error

mae[source]

mae(y_pred, y, weights=None)

Mean Absolute Error

q_loss[source]

q_loss(y_pred, y, quantiles=[0.05, 0.5, 0.95], weights=None)

y_pred: Predicted Value y: Target quantiles: Quantile weights(optional): Weighting of prediction-target pair.

tilted_loss[source]

tilted_loss(y_pred, y, q=0.5)

y_pred: Predicted Value y: Target q: Quantile

weighted_loss[source]

weighted_loss(loss, weights)

Weighted loss
